mentions.context: Numpy library 51 was used to compute means and standard deviations.
Then, thanks to an object classification tool (Ilastik 27 ), images were classified between "Singles", "Multiples", "Death" and "Empty" categories.
We therefore used a random forest classifier implemented under Ilastik software 27 .
